DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis / aim study The aim multicentre study evaluate anatomical functional result innovative posterior tape vaginal prolapse repair vaginal route , comparison sacrospinous suspension . Study design , material method This study involve 5 centre French Public Hospital . Patients randomly allocate operate sacrospinous suspension posterior IVSTM ( Tyco Healthcare , France ) . Prolapse severity evaluate use POP-Q system . In order evaluate patient 's quality life , validate PFDI PFIQ questionnaire use preoperatively follow-up , well validate questionnaire sexual problem . The difference early post-operative pain 30 % ( 40 % sacrospinous suspension 10 % posterior IVS ) . Then estimate number patient 40 arm .
DOC.brief_title: Posterior IVS Versus Sacrospinous Suspension Vaginal Vault Prolapse Repair
DOC.criteria: Age 18 Vaginal vault prolapse grade 2 ( POPQ system ) Symptomatic prolapse Patient unable read French language Cystocele without vaginal vault prolapse Vaginal vault prolapse grade 1 Associated rectal prolapse Rectal inflammatory disease ( Crohn , RCH ) .
